name: Oolong-Crusted Scallops With Citrus Sauce
keywords: appetizer, citrus, green oolong tea, sea scallop
recipeIngredient: 8 tablespoons butter, cut into small pieces
1 tablespoon plus 1 teaspoon oolong tea leaves, finely ground in a coffee grinder
12 sea scallops, tough muscle removed and patted dry

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the juices in a saucepan to just below a simmer, then whisk in the butter, a few pieces at a time. Season with salt and keep warm.
Place the ground tea on a plate. Season the scallops with salt and pepper, then press both sides into the ground tea.

Heat the oil in a cast-iron skillet or sautï¿½ pan over medium heat. Sear the scallops until just warmed through and not yet fully opaque, 1 to 2 minutes per side. Place 3 scallops in each of 4 shallow bowls and spoon the sauce around them.
